name: AverageERWaitTimeforhospitalsaroundyou
0:
”Alexa, ask e. r. for the wait time”
”Alexa, ask e. r. for the nearest wait time”
”Alexa, ask e. r. for wait time in chicago”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: e. r.
des:
Now ask Alexa to get an average ER wait time around you or for a specific hospital. 
Ask Emergency room average wait time for a state or a specific hospital. 

NOTE: It is not a real time ER wait time, please check with the hospital to get the actual ER wait time for any emergency. Skill only provide average ER wait time based on the past historical data.
